ygData.subject: Re: Bug warning! Angstlich's Appalling Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I have been having that same problem as well. If I have a pc targetted screach gives a message that you cant cast on that person or something like that. I
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I have been having that same problem as well. If I have a pc targetted
screach gives a message that you cant cast on that person or something like
that. I practically live in sol b and the trains are sometimes pretty bad so
I use screach fairly often.

What makes it worse when I am grouped with another bard and I need to use
it, it makes it ever harder even if I do remember to not have a target, if
the other bard is singing I will auto target him on the next pulse so I have
a small window to use it....


Tuldar 42 bard Tarew Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: EQBards@onelist.com <EQBards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, December 27, 1999 9:39 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bug warning! Angstlich's Appalling Screech


>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>On the non-PvP servers you will not be able to start this song if you have
a
>PC targeted. This got me killed twice last night in Sol B :(
>
>
>Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
>
>EQ Bard Song Analysis
>http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
